mapper.select: SELECT per.id, per.userid, per.employeenumber, per.depid, per.sex, per.telphoneid, per.mobilephone, per.baseinformationid, per.manageinformationid, per.costinformationid, per.otherinformationid FROM tb_id_personalinformation per JOIN tb_id_user u ON per.userid = u.id JOIN tb_id_department d ON per.depid = d.id JOIN tb_id_baseinformation b ON per.baseinformationid = b.id
